clip_assessment.verbatim_quote: Zillow honestly kind of helps save our team... we were able to diversify spread out across all of greater Los Angeles.
clip_assessment.guest_voice: Jeff speaks in practical, no-BS terms â€” he's a 'carrot not stick' guy who focuses on solutions over theory, uses casual language ('man,' 'kryptonite'), and delivers tactical insights without pretense.
clip_assessment.why_this_stops_scrolls: A top 1% luxury agent admitting a platform most agents love to hate actually saved his business challenges the tribal wisdom and makes you wonder what you're missing.

HOOK.text: A top 1% luxury agent just said Zillow saved his team.
HOOK.production_note: Text overlay on black background: 'ZILLOW SAVED HIS TEAM' â€” then cut to Jeff's face mid-sentence

SETUP.text: Jeff Biebuyck moves luxury properties in Calabasas and Hidden Hills. When his hyper-local market got squeezed, most agents doubled down. He did the opposite.
SETUP.production_note: B-roll of luxury homes in Calabasas/Hidden Hills, then cut to Jeff speaking

INSIGHT.text: Here's what he did: Instead of fighting for scraps in one tight zip code, he used Zillow Flex to spread his team across all of Greater LA. Not as a lead gen tool â€” as a geographic expansion strategy. His exact words: 'Zillow honestly kind of helps save our team... we were able to diversify spread out across all of greater Los Angeles.' While other luxury agents were waiting for their micro-market to recover, Jeff's team was closing deals in six different areas.
INSIGHT.production_note: Show map of LA with multiple pins lighting up. Cut to Jeff's quote. Overlay text: 'DIVERSIFY = SURVIVE'

REFRAME.text: This isn't about Zillow. It's about what happens when you stop being precious about your territory and start thinking like a business owner. Your market doesn't owe you deals. Expansion isn't betrayal.
REFRAME.production_note: Close-up of Jeff, serious tone. Text overlay: 'YOUR MARKET DOESN'T OWE YOU DEALS'

CTA.text: If you're a team leader and your market's contracting, ask yourself: Are you defending territory or building a business? Full episode link in bio.
CTA.production_note: End card with Jeff's name, credentials, and episode CTA. Text: 'TERRITORY OR BUSINESS?'

caption: Top 1% luxury agent: 'Zillow saved our team.' Here's how he used it to escape a contracting market ðŸ‘‡
